channel.title: Code my server
channel.description: i want code my server but when i try to compile that say i need jdk 5 or 6 but i have jdk 13 ... what i do ?

item.title: Code my server
item.dc:creator: @Unf4mili4r1 Unf4mili4r^_^
item.description:
@Unf4mili4r1 wrote:

[font=Century Gothic] I know your problem here, mateo. First off your going to want to edit the compile.bat file - Check the directory in there and all the lines of code make sure it is correct. Some servers that come with compile.bat have this set for certain versions of Java. So just edit the file and directory etc. = Win :)[/font]

Read full topic

item.title: Code my server
item.dc:creator: @xlxoxoxt xlxoxoxt
item.description:
@xlxoxoxt wrote:

Make sure you installed your JDK correctly DO NOT INSTALL IT WITH THE SUN MANAGER

I’ll post a compiler for you.

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Save it as compiler.bat

Read full topic

item.title: Code my server
item.dc:creator: @Rickpwns Rickpwns
item.description:
@Rickpwns wrote:

Any JDK should work. Re-install if problem occurs.
